verses.roman:
sei dvāre ācaṇḍāle kīrtana sañcāre
nāma-prema-mālā gāṅthi' parāila saṁsāre

synonyms: sei dvāre—by that; ā-caṇḍāle—even among the caṇḍālas; kīrtana—the chanting of the holy names; sañcāre—He infuses; nāma—of the holy names; prema—and of love of God; mālā—a garland; gāṅthi'-stringing together; parāila—He put it on; saṁsāre—the whole material world.
translation: Thus He spread kīrtana even among the untouchables. He wove a wreath of the holy name and prema with which He garlanded the entire material world.
